name: Arachnauts
description:
Join Felix and his arachnid family in escaping the ISS back to earth, solving puzzles with webs, boxes, sticks, and each other!

Your objective is to get one spider to the tube, which will take you to the next level.
Use WASD to move.
Use SHIFT or Z to switch between spiders.
Use LMB and RMB to shoot a web, and SPACE to remove all webs!
Use Q and E to reel yourself in each web respectively.
